verses.text: Let \w him|strong="H8010"\w* kiss \w me|strong="H0834"\w* \w with|strong="H8010"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* kiss \w of|strong="H0834"\w* \w his|strong="H0834"\w* mouth: \w for|strong="H8010"\w* thy breasts \w are|strong="H0834"\w* better than wine,

Smelling sweet \w of|strong="H6310"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w best|strong="H2896"\w* ointments. Thy name \w is|strong="H6310"\w* \w as|strong="H3588"\w* oil poured out: \w therefore|strong="H3588"\w* young maidens \w have|strong="H3588"\w* loved thee.

Draw \w me|strong="H5921"\w*: we \w will|strong="H8034"\w* run \w after|strong="H5921"\w* thee \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* odour \w of|strong="H5921"\w* thy ointments. \w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H5921"\w* hath brought \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* storerooms: we \w will|strong="H8034"\w* \w be|strong="H8034"\w* glad \w and|strong="H8081"\w* rejoice \w in|strong="H5921"\w* thee, remembering thy breasts \w more|strong="H3651"\w* \w than|strong="H2896"\w* wine: \w the|strong="H5921"\w* righteous \w love|strong="H0157"\w* thee.

\w I|strong="H0310"\w* am black \w but|strong="H0935"\w* beautiful, \w O|strong="H2142"\w* ye daughters \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Jerusalem, \w as|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* tents \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Cedar, \w as|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* curtains \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Solomon.

\w Do|strong="H0589"\w* \w not|strong="H0168"\w* consider \w me|strong="H0589"\w* \w that|strong="H8010"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* brown, because \w the|strong="H0589"\w* sun hath altered \w my|strong="H0168"\w* colour: \w the|strong="H0589"\w* sons \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w my|strong="H0168"\w* mother \w have|strong="H0589"\w* fought \w against|strong="H3389"\w* \w me|strong="H0589"\w*, \w they|strong="H3389"\w* \w have|strong="H0589"\w* made \w me|strong="H0589"\w* \w the|strong="H0589"\w* keeper \w in|strong="H8010"\w* \w the|strong="H0589"\w* vineyards: \w my|strong="H0168"\w* vineyard \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w have|strong="H0589"\w* \w not|strong="H0168"\w* kept.

Shew \w me|strong="H7760"\w*, \w O|strong="H0589"\w* thou whom \w my|strong="H7760"\w* soul loveth, \w where|strong="H3808"\w* thou feedest, \w where|strong="H3808"\w* thou liest \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* midday, lest \w I|strong="H0589"\w* begin \w to|strong="H1121"\w* wander after \w the|strong="H0853"\w* flocks \w of|strong="H1121"\w* thy companions.

\w If|strong="H1961"\w* thou \w know|strong="H5046"\w* \w not|strong="H1961"\w* thyself, \w O|strong="H4100"\w* fairest \w among|strong="H5921"\w* women, \w go|strong="H1961"\w* forth, \w and|strong="H5315"\w* \w follow|strong="H1961"\w* \w after|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* steps \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w flocks|strong="H5739"\w*, \w and|strong="H5315"\w* \w feed|strong="H7462"\w* thy kids \w beside|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* tents \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w shepherds|strong="H7462"\w*.

\w To|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* company \w of|strong="H5921"\w* horsemen, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* Pharao’s chariots, \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w I|strong="H0518"\w* likened thee, \w O|strong="H0518"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* love.
Thy cheeks \w are|strong="H7393"\w* beautiful as \w the|strong="H1819"\w* turtledove’s, thy neck as jewels.
We will make thee chains \w of|strong="H6677"\w* gold, inlaid \w with|strong="H3895"\w* silver.

\w While|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H5973"\w* king \w was|strong="H3701"\w* \w at|strong="H3701"\w* \w his|strong="H5973"\w* repose, \w my|strong="H5973"\w* spikenard sent forth \w the|strong="H5973"\w* odour thereof.

\w A|strong="H5414"\w* bundle \w of|strong="H4428"\w* myrrh \w is|strong="H4428"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* beloved \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w*, \w he|strong="H5704"\w* \w shall|strong="H4428"\w* abide \w between|strong="H5704"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* breasts.

\w A|strong="H0996"\w* cluster \w of|strong="H0996"\w* cypress \w my|strong="H0996"\w* \w love|strong="H1730"\w* \w is|strong="H1730"\w* to me, \w in|strong="H0996"\w* \w the|strong="H0996"\w* vineyards \w of|strong="H0996"\w* Engaddi.
Behold thou art fair, \w O|strong="H1730"\w* my \w love|strong="H1730"\w*, behold thou art fair, thy eyes are as those \w of|strong="H3754"\w* doves.
\w Behold|strong="H2005"\w* thou art \w fair|strong="H3303"\w*, my beloved, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* comely. \w Our|strong="H5869"\w* bed \w is|strong="H5869"\w* flourishing.
\w The|strong="H0637"\w* beams \w of|strong="H3303"\w* our houses \w are|strong="H0637"\w* \w of|strong="H3303"\w* cedar, our rafters \w of|strong="H3303"\w* cypress trees.
